data.name: Oblivion Eclipse
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST KARAGON!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1818610/Karagon/


About the Game

NEW REVOLUTIONARY FANTASY ACTION RPG.

Elden Ring meets Super Mario Odyssey in this open world souls-like action RPG platformer.
Vast world, slick combat, fun movement.
Slash through gods as you platform your way through a breathtaking world on an unforgettable adventure.

This game is basically Elden Ring / Dark Souls open world but with Super Mario Odyssey / A Hat In Time character movement controls and world design.
We are inspired by many open world titles such as Zelda Breath of the Wild and others.
Combat is souls-like but fast paced mixed with platforming movement controls!

Open World RPG

Our stunning world is full of locations and discoveries that'll keep your experience unique and surprising, and views that will be nothing less than breathtaking.

There are 4 big zones that you will be exploring: the forest, the desert, the skyscapes, and the underworld.
Each zone will have many unique and beautiful environments filled with enemies, bosses, and loot.

Souls-Like Combat

Take down enemies and gods using a fast paced melee souls-like action combat system integrated with your platforming-like movement abilities for avoiding attacks. Emphasizing player-skill-based action.

As you explore and beat gods you'll unlock new areas and find new weapons and character upgrades.

Satisfying & Intuitive Platforming

To traverse the world you will perform combinations of many different moves that are fun, simple, satisfying to pull off, all using intuitive movement controls.

Jump, dash, force sprint, force jump, wall jump, force roll, activate force, and more.
From speeding through forests, to traversing between cliffs, to climbing a massive gorgeous castle - getting around in this open world RPG will NOT just be a walking simulator.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3550 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: To Be Determined
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
